DataElement.preferredDefinition: The start date of medical history event or condition represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the medical conditio
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the medical condition or event start date?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the start date of the medical event or condition using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: MHSTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable MHSTDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: The sponsor may choose to capture a complete date or any variation thereof (e.g., month & year or year, etc.).
